Reviews.Title: “Love love love this resort!!”
Reviews.Author: Myra G
Reviews.Content: loved resort past stayed hotel time renting condo vacation resort spacious convenient location unlike hotel stocked kitchen able cook meals save money disney parks 5 10 minutes able walk nearby shops restaurants resort games play ground 10 son busy home parks atmosphere pool inviting pool heated played music management staff resort definitely book resort trip dont pass

Reviews.Title: “Very Happy Stay”
Reviews.Author: OttawaGirl123
Reviews.Content: loved stay dr husband daughter 9 stayed 4 days close disney 10 min condo spacious spotless kitchen immaculate stocked pots pans dishes etc washerdryer nice bonus cruise able catch laundry pool beautiful happy spend time hot tub 12 hour day parks hesitate recommend spot

Reviews.Title: “WOW! What a difference a year makes!”

Reviews.Content: trip wow pictures internet youtube video true loved consider staying else found management company gotten rid owners am owners reason unhappy people stayed past dont reviews completely pool superb furniture music arcade spa able book shuttle airport highly recommend resort perfect families

Reviews.Content: stayed resort past christmas 2011 booked condo rented 3 bedroom condo spacious neat clean priced located 1 mile disney kids loved lagoon resort style walk pool hot tub water fountain play play ground booked condo read reviews property scott management reviews told assured nice property dont rule based reviews loved mark julie family
